DOC.brief_summary: Comparison safety long-term effect BioMimeTM stent Ultimaster® stent Xience® stent
DOC.brief_title: Real World Drug-Eluting Stent Prospective , Open , Multi-site , Registry Korea : BioMimeTM Stent , Ultimaster® Stent vs. Xience® Stent By SMart Angioplastry Research Team ( SMARTDESK-MX )
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , open , multicenter , observational study register compare Xience® group treat institution BioMime ™ , Ultimaster® group prospectively register June 2016 . The Xience® group already register previous study ( SMARTDESK-BX ) , BioMimeTM Ultimaster® need register . Follow-up conduct December 2019 , e-CRF complete April 2020 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 19 year old old 2 . Clinical evidence coronary artery disease include asymptomatic ischemia , stable angina pectoris , acute coronary syndrome ( unstable angina , nonST segment elevation myocardial infarction , ST segment elevation myocardial infarction ) . 3 . Vessel diameter 2.25 ~ 3.5mm , stenosis 50 % ( However , number blood vessel , number lesion , lesion length limit ) 4 . Voluntary write consent participate trial 1 . Within 24 hour percutaneous coronary intervention , hemodynamic instability cardiogenic shock 2 . Life expectancy within 2 year
DOC.keyword: BioMime , Ultimaster , Ischemic heart disease , DES
